resources.string: Technical Fest Organized by MCA Department
Please bring your mobile when you come for event registration

Esperanza is the Technical Fest Organized by MCA Department PESIT Bangalore South Campus. It was first organized in the year 2012. Esperanza-17 is the sixth event conducted in-line with Esperanza-16. In addition the Department frequently conducts Technical workshops, International Conferences, Seminars on technical topics.

Web Designing
11:15 -02:15
Lab 500
200
11–3-2017
Designing a website on specified topics and presenting.

 [RULES]

 =>2 Member Team.

 => 2 Rounds.

 => Participants should be familiar with Ubuntu Systems, basic knowledge is a must.

 => Permitted Languages : HTML, MySql, PHP, JavaScript, CSS, XHTML.

 => No use of USBs, if found the team can be disqualified.


[NOTE]

 Event's rounds and rules may change due to unavoidable circumstances or situations.

string-array.name: impromptu
string-array.item:
Talk all while you can.

 [RULES]

 => Individual Event.

 => 3 Rounds.

 => Languages allowed only English.

 => Incase of grammar mistakes/error the next contestant will stop you and take over the topic.

 => Judges decision will be final.

string-array.name: silent_speak
string-array.item:
Wrap up the tongue, make sure you won't get hung.

 [RULES]

 => 3 Member Team.

 => 3 Rounds.

 => Technical Topics to be given.

string-array.name: mock_cid
string-array.item:
Event where the participants team will be searching for clues based on instructions.

 [RULES]

 => 4 Member Team.

 => 2 Rounds.

 => Participants will be judged based on their time taken to reach final destination early.

 => Only 4 teams will be qualifying for Round 2.

 => Team to reach the final destination wins the event.

string-array.name: mind_sweeper
string-array.item:
Test your knowledge on IT.

 [RULES]

 => 2 Member Team.
\ => 3 Rounds.
\ => Technical topics to be covered.

string-array.name: conferral
string-array.item:
A presentation event where the paticipants will be showcasing their presentation skills.

 [RULES]

 =>Individual Event.

 =>2 Rounds.

 =>Topics revealed while registeration.

 =>Judging based on Topic, vocabulary, body language, presence of mind.

 =>Vulgarity leads to disqualification.

string-array.name: backyard_cricket_day1
string-array.item:
[RULES]

 => 5 Member Team [+1 for Substitution]

 => 5 Overs Match.

 => 3rd Over Powerplay.

 => One bowler can bowl 2 overs only.

 => 3 bowlers can bowl 1 over each.

 => Runs scored will be doubled, as well as extras will be considered double, a wicket -2 for the batting team.

 => ID Card cumpolsary for the players.

 => Registeration should be done before 1st round.

string-array.name: pictogram
string-array.item:
[RULES]

 => Individual Event.

 => Theme to be revealed at the time of registration.

 => Cameras allowed : Only DSLRs.

 => Camera equipment to be brought by each participant themselves.

 => Light editing allowed.

string-array.name: gaming_fifa_day1
string-array.item:
[RULES]

 => Individual Event.

 => Controller / Gamepads to be brought by participants otherwise a basic controller can be provided.

 => Half Time : 5 mins.

 => Knockout Rounds.

 => The chosen team will be final throughout the tournament.

 => Coin tosses decide Home/Away ground.

 => No use of vulgar languages. If found, the participant will be disqualified.

 => In case of confusions or misunderstandings, coordinator decision will be final.

string-array.name: gaming_cs_day1
string-array.item:
[RULES]

 => 5 Member Team.

 => 3 Rounds for every team.

 => Mouse/Keyboard can be brought by participants otherwise a basic mouse/Keyboard will be provided.

 => Round time : 4 mins.

 => No use of vulgar languages. If found, the participant will be disqualified.

 => In case of confusions or misunderstandings, coordinator decision will be final.

string-array.name: the_overseer_day1
string-array.item:
Only the Best Suits up.

 [RULES]

 => Individual Event.

 => 3 Rounds [Situation Solving, Real and Logical, Stress Interview]

 => Solutions which adhere to Feasibility, Time Constraint, Relevant, Apt/brief.

 => Use of Un-Parliamentary language will result in disqualification

string-array.name: just_code_it
string-array.item:
"Coding is not typing, it is thinking”, code your thoughts in Just Code It.

 [RULES]

 => 2 Member Team.

 => Maximum 2 teams per college.

 => 2 Rounds.

 => General Coding event rules applied.

string-array.name: ideathon
string-array.item:
Feel a Void in Technology, come and present it.

 [RULES]

 =>Individual Event.

 =>One round [5 mins]

 =>Presenting an idea maybe on a Start-up / Technology which may catch up in future.
